name: Gold Train
overview: Gold Train is a 1991 vertically scrolling wild west themed shoot 'em up for the Commodore 64. You play a cowboy on horseback trying to protect a train from various enemies. The game is somewhat similar to the old 1982 Taito arcade game "Wild Western" This game was developed by David Shepherd, Dominic Taylor & Richard Taylor and published in Your Commodore 1991/09 (Tape #21),
